parameters.name: ActionConfig
parameters.description: The action configuration of the automated response rule. The value is in the JSON format.

parameters.name: ActionType
parameters.description:
The type of the handling action. Multiple types are separated by commas (,). Valid values:

*   **doPlaybook**: runs the playbook.
*   **changeEventStatus**: changes the event status.
*   **changeThreatLevel**: changes the threat level of the event.

parameters.name: AutoResponseType
parameters.description:
The type of the automated response rule. Valid values:

*   **event**
*   **alert**

parameters.name: ExecutionCondition
parameters.description: The trigger condition of the automated response rule. The value is in the JSON format.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The data management center of the threat analysis feature. Specify this parameter based on the regions in which your assets reside. Valid values:

*   **cn-hangzhou**: Your assets reside in regions in China.
*   **ap-southeast-1**: Your assets reside in regions outside China.

parameters.name: RoleFor
parameters.description: The ID of the account that you switch from the management account.

parameters.name: RoleType
parameters.description:
The type of the view. Valid values:
- 0: the current Alibaba Cloud account
- 1: the global account

parameters.name: SubUserId
parameters.description: The ID of the user who created the rule.
